com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util
Class SourceCodeFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.util.SourceCodeFactory

public class SourceCodeFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates all methods providing source code needed in the process of creating a new DSL with the FurcasWizard. All information needed for the generic source code generation is retrieved from the associated ProjectInfo. It uses the method readFile() to read the files in the resources folder. StringTemplate is now used to replace certain variables in the code by the values entered in the wizard.

setTemplateAtts

private void setTemplateAtts(StringTemplate template,
                             ProjectInfo pi)
Sets the attributes for the StringTemplate.

Example: If you want to replace the variable $example$ in the text file with the String "Hello World":

String hello = "Hello World";
template.setAttribute("example", hello);

Parameters:
template - The StringTemplate
pi - The user input
